cause.description:
New Sudan Education Initiative (NESEI) is an international non-profit organization with offices in Burlington, Vermont; Knoxville, Tennessee; and South Sudan.
We have 4 main strategies for developing young leaders:
1) Make quality secondary education accessible and affordable through tuition sponsorship, work-study and teacher support.
2) Ensure students’ physical and mental health by providing preventative care and health education.
3) Put students on the fast-track to success in a difficult post-conflict society through practical school-to-work, entrepreneurial and leadership skill-building enrichment.
4) Provide graduating NESEI students with post-secondary opportunities such as microfinance and scholarships for university studies.
Please visit our website, www.nesei.org, for more information about us and how you can get involved with NESEI's important work.
